name: shapeliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a woman's body or parts of a woman's body) the quality of having an attractive form: Her figure had lost a lot of its former shapeliness. When designing a shoe, it is desirable to combine style and shapeliness with ease and comfort. See
shapely
More examplesFewer examplesIn the ancient sculptures, the emphasis is on slimness, shapeliness, and gracefulness.She had covered up the lovely shapeliness of her legs with long leather boots.Beauty is not just about elegance, shapeliness, or any other kind of surface physicality.
